pullrequest.title: Update control sync tutorial sample code and launch file to work with atlas v4/v5

content.raw:
The rqt_plot command looks to be slightly broken; it renders all of the signals on one plot, and only one signal appears (probably due to scaling issues) even though all are present on the legend.

![rqt.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/RMMxjX/images/3637664437-rqt.png)
content.html: The rqt_plot command looks to be slightly broken; it renders all of the signals on one plot, and only one signal appears (probably due to scaling issues) even though all are present on the legend.
